channel.title: Looking for Tutor
channel.description:
I don't expect to get one within 10 seconds, just so you know.
I'm looking for a tutor that can teach me the more advanced and yet some basic coding. The last one didn't work out to well, an uptight racist 12 year old, Chemical kid.
Quotes from Msn:
Chemical kid: haha you have 15 people on and i have 200 thats sad Me: Sorry, no offence but you sound a bit like a toser. Chemical kid: haha you a tosser Me: haha get your priorities right, your not a higher being, your server isn't any better than mine becuase yous has 180 people more. Chemical kid: YOUR JELOUS Chemical kid: Fat jew.
I found all that quite funny to be honest.
anyways. If you think your up for it, i'm a quick learner. I know some basics.
Pm me or post!
thanks tawr

item.description:
@tawr wrote:

added, thanks any help is appreciated.

item.title: Looking for Tutor
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I wont exactly be your tutor, but you’re free to drop me a line on msn, motocross_is@hotmail.com if you need help. I don’t really know about much on Winterloves sources etc, just mainly Java.

Read full topic
